subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Joey Logano pulled away on a restart to win a green-white-checkered finish Sunday at New Hampshire Motor Speedway in Loudon and advance to the second round of the Chase for the Sprint Cup.
snippet: Joey Logano pulled away on a restart to win a green-white-checkered finish Sunday at New Hampshire Motor Speedway in Loudon and advance to the second round of the Chase for the Sprint Cup.
